name: Phan Lê Nhã Kỳ
desc: kieee im sorry for not being able to stay with you close.. i know your secrets, you knew my secrets yet you kept it till the end of the world, I'd always be missing you, i hope i get cellular data asap after taking off!!! again im so heckin sorry for leaving you.. we all got plans and im sure yours gonna fly high:) hope you get on well with that guy you liked, don't break your heart again, I'm always here when you need, please just text me and let me know your thoughts!!
